name: JBox Web :: Free Projects
tagline: A french Web Agency, based in Marseille www.jbox-web.com.
body:
Why this page?
==============
Because at JBox Web we do love Free (Open Source) projects, we try to contribute here, by publishing the source code of the tools we develop or improve for our use.

* [Gitolite (Grit version)](http://jbox-web.github.io/gitolite/)
* [Gitolite (Rugged version)](http://jbox-web.github.io/gitolite-rugged/)
* [Redmine Git Hosting](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_git_hosting/)
* [Redmine Mail Checker](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_mail_checker/)
* [Redmine Jenkins](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_jenkins/)
* [Redmine Danthes](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_danthes/)
* [Redmine Default Members](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_default_members/)
* [Redmine Pusher Notifications](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_pusher_notifications/)
* [acts_as_notifiable_redmine](http://jbox-web.github.io/acts_as_notifiable_redmine/)
* [Redmine Bootstrap Kit](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_bootstrap_kit/)
* [Redmine JQuery Colorbox](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_jquery_colorbox/)
* [Redmine JQuery OpenTip](http://jbox-web.github.io/redmine_jquery_opentip/)
* [Django Gearman JBox](http://jbox-web.github.io/django-gearman-jbox/)
* [Jyraphe](http://jbox-web.github.io/jyraphe/)
* and more to come...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
